document.full_text: when abu ibrahim fled fighting near the libyan town of ajdabiyah a month ago, he was sure he would be back home in a few days -- after all, nato had just begun to bomb muammar gaddafi's forces.
document.title: libyans brace for long wait at refugee shelter
lines_and_colors: when abu ibrahim fled fighting near the libyan town of ajdabiyah a month ago, he was sure he would be back home in a few days -- after all, nato had just begun to bomb muammar gaddafi's forces.
